title: A new trailer for this 'embroidered medieval platformer' shows off the sprawling underworld  buried under its sunny village.
description: Scarlet Deer Inn's latest trailer revealed more of its underground exploration.

title: If I could go back in time and save one canceled game, it'd be the 2005 Fallout spiritual successor prototyped by the series' original creators
description: My heart yearns for "Epic," the prototype Troika post-apocalyptic demo.

title: 22-year-old castle sim Stronghold is getting a definitive remaster
description: Complete with Steam Workshop support and new historical and narrative campaigns.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #757: Sunday, July 16
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters is getting a free update with new enemies and gear, seems to be teasing more DLC
description: A teaser trailer and nine extra hidden achievements suggest DLC is on the way.

title: I'm hoping Baldur's Gate 3 just glazes over the weird bummer 'canon' version of what happened in the first two games
description: What the heck is an "Abdel Adrian?"
